"Ratel":
"Oh, what are you doing all the way out here?
Huh? You were looking for me?"
"I see, so Rasta sent you. Sorry for the trouble. I decided to check out these Ore veins while I was out."

"As you can see, I'm in no trouble here.
But my partner was out here with me..."
"We split up to investigate, and I lost contact with him."
"Would you mind helping me look for him? His name's Rooikat."
"You head to the Oasis, I'll check out the other areas."
"Maybe he went to the campsite past the Oasis. Could you keep looking? I'm counting on you!"
